name: Clockwork Dungeon (itch) (FlowerSnek)
description:
This dungeon-crawler game was created for the fifth Nokia Jam.

The Mecanix Empire, a space-faring army of robotic creatures, is invading your world to consume and destroy it! The king has sent you on a dangerous mission: venture into the invaders' mothership, and climb the 20 floors to find and destroy their leader. But be careful — between you and your goal is a huge army of robot warriors of all types, and they won't stop attacking until you've been reduced to atoms!

Gameplay

Explore each floor of the dungeon, fighting enemies and collecting items. When you engage an enemy, time your attacks to deal the most damage possible, then dodge their counterattacks in real-time. Save up gold to buy items and upgrade your stats. Use the potions and bombs you find lying around to secure victory against bosses! But be careful — you only have 3 chances to survive...

After every floor, your progress is saved.

Controls

  • Arrow keys to move.
  • Z to confirm.
  • X to cancel out of shops and menus.
